config.Mushrooms.name: Mushrooms
config.SmallCrystals.name: Small Crystals
config.SmallCrystals.description: Enables/disables small decorative crystals on the map.
config.LargeCrystal.name: Large Crystal
config.LargeCrystal.description: Enables/disables the large purple crystal in the healing/swimming lake.
config.WaterPlants.name: Water Plants
config.WaterPlants.description: Enables/disables water plants in the rivers and lakes (including lily pads and water lilies).
config.WaterfallColor.name: Waterfall Color
config.WaterfallMist.name: Waterfall Mist For Yri Waterfalls
config.WaterfallMist.description: Enables/disables misting effects at the bottom of waterfalls for the Yri versions.
config.ShadowEffects.name: Shadow Effects
config.ShadowEffects.description: Overlay a shadow effect on the map, darkening certain areas to give it a more enclosed feel.
config.SparklingLights.name: Sparkling Lights
config.SparklingLights.description: Adds more sparkling lights around the rivers and foliage. Works best with Shadow Effects enabled.
config.Fairies.name: Fairies
config.Fairies.description: Add glowing/sparkling fairies around the map for more enchanting ambiance.
